scripts.build-release: scripts\build-js.bat & npm run build-js-css & npm run build-css
scripts.build-debug: scripts\build-js-debug.bat & npm run build-js-css & npm run build-css
scripts.build-release-win: start /min cmd /c scripts\build-js.bat && start /min cmd /c npm run build-js-css && start /min cmd /c npm run build-css
scripts.build-release-linux: npm run build-js & npm run build-js-css & npm run build-css & npm run build-php-env
scripts.build-debug-linux: npm run build-js-debug & npm run build-js-css & npm run build-css & npm run build-php-env
